title: Gruppo per le scrim
body:
Hello I created a Discord group to bring together more people trying scrim.

**Who we are?**
It's me and a group of coaches to have founded this group, initially on the League of Legends Channel (had a 50 person limit), then we decided to change the structure

**What is Discord?**
Discord is a program with textual and voice channels

**Why did you choose Discord?**
Because Discord is really very simple and very easy to use, you can use the browser without downloading it, does not slow down your computer and weighs only 50 mb

**How to join**
To enter the server just ur team be divisive than platinum +, if your team are platinum +, add me on LoL: CloudStrikee or on Discord: CloudStrikee#4290

**How many people are there at the moment?**
We currently have 400 teams

Thank you all
-CloudStrikee
